title: Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries: Cocaine Blues (Series 01. Ep. 01)
genre: Courtroom, Crime, Espionage & Thrillers/Detective and mystery films
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Drug traffic - Investigation
abstract: The pilot episode, and first to air, of this television mystery drama series, featuring private detective Miss Phryne Fisher on the case set in Melbourne's underworld of the 1920s.
description: The Honourable Miss Phryne Fisher disembarks the Orient at Victoria Dock, returning to Melbourne after years abroad. Almost as soon as she checks into the Windsor Hotel, Phryne is embroiled in mystery: poisoned husbands, cocaine smuggling rings and illegal abortionists – not to mention erotic encounters with the handsome Russian dancer, Sasha de Lisse. Her adventure reaches its steamy end in the Turkish Bath Palace off Little Lonsdale Street. [Source: Every Cloud Productions]
